name: Downward Frog
description:
A toy frog slips into the pool drain... what will it find?

Avoid weird fish! Collect bubbles! (and health!) Make it to the bottom...?

Controls:

A/D or Left/Right Arrow Keys: Move Left and Right

Space, J, or Shift: Use a Bubble to Dodge (Press while holding Left or Right to dodge that direction, or press while holding neither to dodge upward!)

ESC: Pause

F: Fullscreen

R: Restart When Paused


Made...

...in 72 Hours for Ludum Dare 48: Deeper and Deeper!

...with Game Maker Studio 2, ChipTone, JummBox (A mod of BeepBox), and Aseprite!

...by @GogglesKitty!
